p: Genomic coordinates of known QTLs for seed size/weight and associated genes available in the previous studies (Bajaj et al., 2015; Das et al., 2014; Kujur et al., 2015; Saxena et al., 2014; Singh et al., 2016; Verma et al., 2015), were used. We intersected the genomic position of miRNAs and their target genes with QTL genomic coordinates using bedtools to identify QTL‐associated miRNAs and/or target genes.
